lead_paragraph: Afghanistan’s former interior minister and ambassador to Pakistan argues that President Ashraf Ghani should not gamble political capital on a miraculous U-turn from Islamabad.

headline.main: Afghanistan and Pakistan: The False Promise of Rapprochement
headline.print_headline: Afghanistan and Pakistan: The False Promise of Rapprochement'

snippet: Afghanistan’s former interior minister and ambassador to Pakistan argues that President Ashraf Ghani should not gamble political capital on a miraculous U-turn from Islamabad.
